article_title: U.N. Urges More Action to Guard Great Barrier Reef
article_text:
Unesco decided on Wednesday not to place the Great Barrier Reef on its list of at-risk World Heritage sites, but warned that it could act next year because of concerns over the environmental impact of plans for a massive coal-port expansion nearby.

The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization said that Australia must step up efforts to protect the reef, which has lost half its coral cover over the past 30...

twitter.description: The U.N. has kept the Great Barrier Reef off its list of at-risk world heritage sites for another year, despite expressing concerns over plans for a massive coal-port expansion and the dumping of millions of tons of dredge waste into the marine park.
twitter.title: U.N. Urges More Action to Guard Great Barrier Reef
